mapper.select:
select bno,title,writer,name,regdate,viewcnt,show ,(select count(*) from reply where bno=b.bno) cnt from board b, member m
order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into attach (fullName, bno) values (#{fullName}, seq_board.currval )
mapper.select: select count(*) from board b, member m
mapper.update: update board set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select fullName from attach where bno=#{bno} order by regdate desc
mapper.delete: update board set show='N' where bno=#{bno}
